relationship.name: ApplicationEnvironment
relationship.description: Define process environment for this application.

relationship.name: host
relationship.description: VirtualHost to run this application on

attribute.name: port
attribute.description: Port for REST configuration interface

class.name: DaqModule
class.description: A plugin module for the app framework

attribute.name: plugin
attribute.description: Name of daq application plugin implementing this module

relationship.name: inputs
relationship.description: List of connections to/from this module

attribute.name: connection_type
attribute.description: Type of the network connection

attribute.name: protocol
attribute.description: Protocol of the connection tcp or udp

relationship.name: network
relationship.description: Network interfaces attached to this host

attribute.name: address
attribute.description: IP address in form a.b.c.d

attribute.name: networkMask
attribute.description: Network mask in for a.b.c.d

attribute.name: speed
attribute.description: Speed of network on this interface in Gb/s

attribute.name: interface
attribute.description: Name of interface e.g. eth0 or eno1

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Name of network on this interface Control or Data

class.name: NumaNode
class.description: Part of host associated with 1 NUM node

attribute.name: cpu_cores
attribute.description: List of CPU cores avalable on this NUMA node. Syntax may be comma separated list or range n..m or combination of both. If using a range the step can also be given by adding :s. For example 0..63:2 will select even numbered cores from 0 to 63

attribute.name: resources
attribute.description: List of resources associated with this NUMA node

attribute.name: Description
attribute.description: Description of this NUMA node

class.name: Parameter
class.description: This abstract class is used to describe a single variable (name:value pair) or a set of variables.

attribute.name: Description
attribute.description: Describes the purpose of the parameter.

attribute.name: count
attribute.description: Number of CPU cores required by this claim

relationship.name: processor
relationship.description: ProcessingResource that this claims a part of

attribute.name: queue_type
attribute.description: Type of queue

class.name: RCApplication
class.description: An executable which allows users to control datataking

attribute.name: Timeout
attribute.description: Seconds to wait before giving up on a transition

relationship.name: ApplicationsControlled
relationship.description: Applications RC is in charge of

attribute.name: Description
attribute.description: A description of the session.

attribute.name: use_connectivity_server
attribute.description: If set publish and lookup connection information in the connectivity server. If not all information will be provided by the configuration database.

attribute.name: connectivity_service_interval_ms
attribute.description: Interval between publishes and polls of connectivity service information

relationship.name: applications
relationship.description: The list of applications to be started in this Session

relationship.name: ProcessEnvironment
relationship.description: Define process environment for any application run in given session.

attribute.name: storage
attribute.description: Amount of disk storage available for output data on this host in GB

class.name: Variable
class.description: A Variable associates a value with string name. It is used for process environment and database strings substitution.

attribute.name: Name
attribute.description: Name of the variable.

attribute.name: Value
attribute.description: Default value of the variable. If TagValues is not empty, the value can be re-defined by corresponding tag in the context of the application's process environment.

class.name: VariableSet
class.description: Set of variables or variable sets. Names and values of all nested variables are added to value of relationship using resource set.

relationship.name: Contains
relationship.description: List of included variables or variable sets.

relationship.name: hw_resources
relationship.description: Hardware resources required by this virtual host
